metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25640 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: In wolfSSL before 5.2.0, a TLS 1.3 server cannot properly enforce a requirement for mutual authentication. A client can simply omit the certificate_verify message from the handshake, and never present a certificate.

criterions.comment: wolfssl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
